{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Arris |model=RAC2V1A |revision=(TR4400-AC) |fcc_date=08/24/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=UIDTR4400, H8NRAC2V1K |pcb_id=CAU00N0E-1.0MM |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8065;Q, IPQ8065, 0VV, FK7043MS, K070400; |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=512 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30UF4G28AB-TI |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC256M16DP-DI |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0, Mini PCIe |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=Askey WLL4230 Dual |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=QCA9984 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_module=Askey WLL4230 Dual |wi2_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9983 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=MHF4 |wi2_txchains=3 |wi2_rxchains=3 |wi2_sstreams=3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;Skyworks;SKY2623L;;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Power Amplifier Module;RFMD;RFPA5542;;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, DFS, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |oui= |oui_eth= }} :Also known as the '''Arris TR4400-AC'''
*{{WiFiCert|WFA71730|05/09/2017}}
DFS support was added with an FCC Class II Permissive Change :request on 12/20/2017. <!--{{FCC ST|02/20/2018|indexme.}}-->
